Package gobblin.restli.throttling

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ThrottlingPolicy
    A throttling policy.
    ThrottlingPolicyFactory.SpecificPolicyFactory  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CountBasedPolicy
    A count based ThrottlingPolicy used for testing.
    CountBasedPolicy.Factory  
    DynamicTokenBucket
    A wrapper around a TokenBucket that returns different number of tokens following an internal heuristic.
    LimiterServerResource
    Restli resource for allocating permits through Rest calls.
    NoopPolicy
    A ThrottlingPolicy that does no throttling and eagerly returns a large amount of permits.
    NoopPolicy.Factory  
    QPSPolicy
    A ThrottlingPolicy based on a QPS (queries per second).
    QPSPolicy.Factory  
    ThrottlingGuiceServletConfig
    GuiceServletContextListener for creating an injector in a gobblin-throttling-server servlet.
    ThrottlingPolicyFactory
    A SharedResourceFactory to create ThrottlingPolicys.
    TokenBucket
    An implementation of Token Bucket (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Token_bucket).
